tokenvisibility.settings.vision-percent-: Percentage of the token hit area that must be viewable to another token to be considered visible by that other token. If set to 0, then if any part of the token is viewable, it is considered visible.
tokenvisibility.settings.vision-algorith:
How to test whether a token is visible to another.
Algorithms loosely sorted from least to most performance-intensive.
See https://github.com/caewok/fvtt-token-visibility#settings for a full explanation.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-algorithm:
How to test whether a token has cover in relation to another.
Algorithms loosely sorted from least to most performance-intensive.
See https://github.com/caewok/fvtt-token-visibility#settings for a full explanation.
Name of low cover displayed to users.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-name-medi: Name of medium cover displayed to users.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-name-high: Name of high cover displayed to users.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-effect-lo: Name of the active effect to add to a token with low cover. Leave blank for none.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-effect-me: Name of the active effect to add to a token with medium cover. Leave blank for none.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-effect-hi: Name of the active effect to add to the token with high cover. Leave blank for none.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-trigger-c: When this or more corners are blocked, the token will have low cover unless a higher level of cover applies.
When this or more corners are blocked, the token will have medium cover unless a higher level of cover applies. Hex grids will add one to this value.
If this many corners or more are blocked, the token will have high cover. Hex grids will add one to this value. Set to 99 to prevent automatic assignment of high cover.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-trigger-a: If less than this percent of the token area is viewable, the token will have low cover.
If less than this percent of the token area is viewable, the token will have medium cover.
If less than this percent of the token area is viewable, the token will have high cover.
tokenvisibility.settings.cover-trigger-c: When the line from one token center to another token center is blocked, use this cover type. (PF2e uses Medium, or Standard, cover.)
